Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor Introduction and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets up an initial mystery involving a suspicious sedan and a waterfront encounter, leading to his transformation and first action as a superhero.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Origin Setup
sub_scenes.description: The cover page serves as the introduction, establishing the character, setting, and initial premise of the Human Meteor story.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, picks up wealthy passengers and notices a suspicious sedan following him, creating initial suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Call to Action
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor, reacting to the suspicious sedan and preparing to take action.

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the occupants of the sedan, leading to a fight and the arrival of the police.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor is in the hospital, discussing suspicions of a yacht with a police officer. Duke, back in civilian clothes, plans to stowaway on the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

sub_scenes.title: Hidden Observer's Perspective
sub_scenes.description: A hidden observer is revealed, adding another layer of intrigue and potential connection to the unfolding events.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to the yacht 'Marlin' and focuses on Pete/Toby's investigation, his discovery of a conspiracy, and the underwater confrontation involving Namor.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Intrusion
sub_scenes.description: Pete is on deck duty, observes divers, and then decides to investigate a cabin, leading to a crucial discovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Mission Briefing and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby receives a mission briefing and dives underwater, discovering a sunken Japanese submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Submarine Escape
sub_scenes.description: Toby gets into a fight with enemy divers, while a submarine prepares for a hasty escape.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Intervention and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor intervenes, attacking the submarine with a torpedo and then shifting his focus to the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air
Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spies and Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi spies and transitions to a mystery involving boys, a garage, and a sinister conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Combat
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are engaged in a firefight against Nazi fiends.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance and find a dropped wallet, leading them to investigate a garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man
The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address

sub_scenes.title: Garage Observation and Police Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe a marine saluting a civilian and then encounter a police officer at the garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marine Salute and Major Bronson
Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Threats, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, while a parallel scene reveals a carbon monoxide plot and a betrayal by Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Revelation, and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: Boys escape, discover sabotage plans, and the narrative shifts to an attack on the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marine Counter-Attack and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, engage in combat, and ultimately defeat the Nazi spy ring, resolving the barracks attack.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America and the Kidnapped Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Champ and Henry in South America, where they are ambushed, arrive in a town, and get entangled in the mystery of President Rosita's kidnapped daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a desert-like landscape and arrive in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Rosita's Kidnapping Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are confronted and interrogated by soldiers, who reveal the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul
Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Mistaken Identity and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Two men are captured and driven to a house, where they are mistaken as rescuers of Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Hostage Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, tasked with a mission related to a hostage situation and facing betrayal and torture.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan is introduced in jungle combat, followed by a briefing on a hostage situation involving Captain Lawton's son.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle but is observed and ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, tortured for plans, and ultimately submits under duress.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Arson, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan escapes, causing a fire, is pursued, and then forms an alliance with natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Duty and Dolan's Spanking
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts back to the ship, where the Captain grapples with Grauer's demands, encounters unexpected allies, and ultimately spanks Dolan as a form of discipline and affection.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigate the Reilly Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to a hospital, a racketeering conspiracy, and a dramatic rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Introduction and Case Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins story and their briefing on the Robert Burgess murder case at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly
Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Dilemma and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: Miss Reilly's critical condition and need for Farnacci's blood type lead to the discovery of Farnacci's racketeering and a call to Elijah.

narrative_arcs.title: Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood
Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Search for Tom Reilly and Murphy's Confession
sub_scenes.description: The Twins search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and then meet Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Farnacci's deal.

narrative_arcs.title: Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession
Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation
